raw_mentions: EC50 values for binding (ng/mL) are shown in each square.

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

* The antibody recognizes the HA head domain from nearly all subtypes of influenza A viruses, with KD values extending to low nanomolar, even in their monomeric Fab form. 

Note: There is only one sentence that meets the criteria, which mentions the molecule (HA head domain), bioactivity metric (KD), numeric value (low nanomolar), and unit (nanomolar).

There are no sentences that meet the specified criteria. The text does not contain sentences with a specific molecule name, a bioactivity metric (IC50, Ki, Kd, EC50), a numeric value, and a unit. The text primarily describes methods and procedures for protein expression, purification, and structure determination.

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

FluA-20 exhibited extraordinary binding breadth and affinity to recombinant HAs belonging to group 1 (H1, H2, H5, H6, H8, H9, H11 and H12) and group 2 (H3, H4, H7, H10, H14 and H15) viruses, with EC50 values for binding ranging from 5 ng/mL to 142 ng/mL (FIG. 1C and FIG. S1A).
Remarkably, even in this monovalent form, rFluA-20 Fab interacted with most HA molecules from H1, H2, H3, H5, and H7 subtypes with K<sub>D</sub> values less than 100 nM (with several less than 1 nM, Table S1).
Both monomers bind to FluA20 with high affinity (KD<10 nM) and to FluA20_UCA with moderate affinity (K~500 nM).

There are no sentences that meet the specified criteria. The text does not contain any sentences with a specific molecule name, ID, or other identifier, a bioactivity metric (IC50, Ki, Kd, EC50, etc.), a specific numeric value for that metric, and a unit for that value.

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


The plates then were blocked with 50 µL of 5% non-fat dry milk and 0.1% Tween-20 in D- PBS (ELISA buffer) for 1 hr at RT, with a starting concentration of 10 µg/mL of the mAb, to determine EC50 concentrations for binding.
Each dilution was performed in quadruplicate, and the EC50 values were calculated in Prism software (GraphPad) using non-linear regression analysis, with a starting concentration of 10 µg/mL of the mAb.
Oseltamivir phosphate (hereafter referred to as oseltamivir) (Roche, Palo Alto, CA) diluted in sterile PBS was inoculated i.p. at 30 mg/kg/day, with an EC50 not explicitly stated but a dose of 30 mg/kg/day.
Ketamine-xylazine anesthetized mice were inoculated by the intranasal (i.n.) route at 24 hours after the mAb treatment with 2,200 50% cell culture infectious doses (CCID50) mouse adapted influenza A/California/04/2009 (H1N1pdm) in 90 µL of sterile PBS, with a CCID50 of 2,200.
